channel.title: Server Hosting?
channel.description:
Im Having trouble with hosting on my laptop.. I Can host perfectly fine on my main computer , the router has been port forwarded and my laptop connects to the router through wireless? Any Help
Thanks

item.title: Server Hosting?
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

you’re laptop and router have the same gateway… however a different ip. For example:

your Gateway could be “786. 675.47” and your ip could be “192.168.900.1” So what you need to do is find the ip of your computer. By using CMD.

‘ipconfig’ blah…blah…

find your ip portforward that ip (I suggest using Utorrent) then live happily ever after.

THE END.

Read full topic
